line.text: %CaptainAmericaSimple%I've always suspected that Winter Soldier was a former associate of mine. Nick Fury recently confirmed that he was my former sidekick Bucky. I thought he had died in the explosion on the plane when we were trying to disarm that bomb so many years ago.

%CaptainAmericaSimple%It turns out that he survived somehow, just as I had. A russian sub commander found him, brain washed him, and trained him as an assassin. What exactly he is doing on the S.H.I.E.L.D. helicarrier now though, I don't know for sure, but he has planted bombs near critical equipment in an attempt to cripple the helicarrier.

%CaptainAmericaSimple%I have had bad experiences with bombs in the past when trying to disarm them, so I need to be careful and keep a steady hand. If things go bad though, I always have my trusty shield to protect me.
